00127         
00128         //adding data from eion, eheat and cuts files from the ERA output
00129         //many of these values might want to be stored in boloPulse Sub record
00130         //at a later time. This is where they should be, logically. But, given
00131         //the need for analysis now, we put these data here without thinking about it
00132         //the FID detectors, for example, do not have a guard channel. 
00133         
00134         //eion
00135         Double32_t fEnergyCollectrode[2];
00136         Double32_t fEnergyVeto[2];
00137         Double32_t fEnergyGuard[2];
00138         Double32_t fEnergyBaselineCollectrode[2];
00139         Double32_t fEnergyBaselineVeto[2];
00140         Double32_t fEnergyBaselineGuard[2];
00141         Double32_t fBaselineNoiseCollectrode[2];
00142         Double32_t fBaselineNoiseVeto[2];
00143         Double32_t fBaselineNoiseGuard[2];
00144         Double32_t fEnergyIonFiducial;  //NOT redundant with fEnergyIon
00145         Double32_t fBaselineIonFiducial;
00146         //Double_t fPolarFlag;  //same as fVoltageFlag. 
00147         
00148         //eheat
00149         Double32_t fEnergyBaselineHeat;
00150         Double32_t fBaselineHeat;
00151         
00152         //cuts
00153         TBits fCuts;  //the order of bits in the TBits is 
00154         //cuts.CutChi2Col1 -- bit 0
00155         //cuts.CutChi2Col2 -- bit 1
00156         //cuts.CutChi2Vet1 -- bit 2
00157         //cuts.CutChiVet2  -- 3
00158         //cuts.CutChi2Gar1 -- 4
00159         //cuts.CutChi2Gar2 -- 5
00160         //cuts.CutChi2Heat -- 6
00161         //cuts.CutChi2     -- 7
00162         //cuts.CutCol1Base -- 8 //the baseline "too large" check
00163         //cuts.CutCol2Base -- 9
00164         //cuts.CutVet1Base -- 10
00165         //cuts.CutVet2Base -- 11
00166         //cuts.CutGar1Base -- 12
00167         //cuts.CutGar2Base -- 13
00168         //cuts.CutHeatBase -- 14
00169         //cuts.CutBases    -- 15
00170         //cuts.CutRun      -- 16
00171         
00172         //TRefArray fHLAPulseSubRecords; //an array of the HLA PulseSub Records associated with this bolo record
00173         //TRefArray fRawPulseSubRecords; //an array of the Raw PulseSub Records associated with this bolo record
00174         
00175         //private methods
00176         void InitializeMembers(void);
00177         void CopyLocalMembers(const EdwHLASingleBoloSubRecord &aRec);

00179   ClassDef(EdwHLASingleBoloSubRecord,2);
